modal.title: Buy order confirmation
modal.info: Please confirm your buy order on Metamask extension

modalSuccess.title: Success!
text: You`re order of {{ amountValue }} {{ amountMarket }} with a limit price of {{ priceValue }} {{ priceMarket }} was successfully added to the order book. You can check status of your open orders in the «orders» panel.
If you want to receive notifications when your order is filled, allow browser notifications from MeterQubes

modalValueError.title: Incorrect value
modalValueError.text: Price and amount must be greater than 0

modalWrap.title: Transaction confirmation
text: The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps. Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs.
You can easily unwrap WETH by pressing «Unwrap WETH» button
modalWrap.button: Please confirm your transaction on your Metamask extension

modalWrapVerifying.title: Transaction verifying
modalWrapVerifying.text: Please wait untill we verify your transaction on the blockchain
